Token.Abstract: This class implements a set of MBML functions and supporting methods that provide access to Objective-C runtime information.
Given a Class or a string containing the name of an Objective-C class, this method returns a Class object.

Parameter.Name: resolveCls
Parameter.Abstract: A Class object or an NSString instance containing the name of a class.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: If non-nil and an error occurs, *errPtr will be set to an MBMLFunctionError instance indicating the error.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A Class object representing the specified class, or nil if the specified class was not recognized by the Objective-C runtime.

Token.Abstract: Determines whether a given class exists in the Objective-C runtime.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If there is a class with the given name, @YES is returned. Otherwise, @NO.

Token.Abstract: Returns the Class object for the given class name.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If there is a class with the given name, the corresponding Class object is returned. Otherwise, nil is returned.

Token.Abstract: Returns the singleton instance of a given class.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If there is a class with the given name, the corresponding Class object is returned. Otherwise, nil is returned.

Token.Abstract: Returns an array containing the inheritance hierarchy of a given class.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array containing the Objective-C class hierarchy for the specified class. If no such class was found, nil is returned.

Token.Abstract: Determines whether a given object instance responds to a specific Objective-C message selector.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If object instance referenced in the object expression responds to the selector specified in the selector expression, the return value will be @YES. Otherwise, @NO will be returned.

Token.Abstract: Determines whether a given class responds to a specific Objective-C message selector.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If the Objective-C class referenced in the class expression responds to the selector specified in the selector expression, the return value will be @YES. Otherwise, @NO will be returned.
